## Hex codes for B-cell lymphomas

### General palette

```{r cars,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
#devtools::install_github("morinlab/ggsci",quiet=T)
library(ggsci)

show_col = function(x){
  cols=ggsci::get_ash(x)
  col_df = data.frame(Name=names(cols),Code=unname(cols))
  col_df %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
  
  column_spec(1, color = "white",
              background = col_df$Code) %>% 
    column_spec(2, color = "white",
              background = col_df$Code)
}

show_col("b-cell")


```

### Cell of Origin

```{r coo, echo=FALSE}
show_col("coo")
```

